pageTitle: Sen. Lindsey Graham: Campaign Finance/Money - Other Data - Senator 2014 | OpenSecrets
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {923=Lindsey Graham sponsored or co-sponsored 49 earmarks totaling $78,847,090 in fiscal year 2010, ranking 81st out of 100 senators. See details. To learn more about earmarks, visit our Earmarks section.}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {937=Based on data released by the FEC on March 09, 2015.}

textAfterTable: IE is Independent Expenditures, CC is Communication Cost and EC is Electioneering Communications. Coordinated Expenditures are not included.
